entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 30%
